short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Extension that lets you quickly access JIRA tickets by their number and supports multiple projects.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open JIRA is a cool Chrome Extension for JIRA users. With it, you can quickly jump to a JIRA ticket just by typing its number. No need to search or click through many pages! Plus, if you work with multiple JIRA projects, this tool's got your back. You can add more than one project to it.

So, if you're using JIRA and want a faster way to get to your tickets, Open JIRA is the tool for you. Give it a try!
